variables-question_key1: *To answer any question you can `upload` the `file`.*
variables-question_key3: **Just for your ease we have broken up this question into multiple parts. But you have to do the submission in single `file` only.**
variables-question_key5: Assign an `INTEGER` value to a `variable` named as `variable_nav`.
variables-question_key8: Take a new `variable` named as `gurukul` and assign any `STRING` value to it.
variables-question_key9: Assign a `FLOAT` value to `variable_nav` and set it.
variables-question_key10: Now print the value of `variable_nav` and `gurukul`.
